abilities.desc: After you spend Iron tokens, you may deal 1 damage to one enemy within range of you or your Copies.
You may spend Iron tokens to Reduce Hits to your Copies.

actions.name: Reflections of the Self
actions.desc:
Place a Copy into an empty space within range, then gain 2 Iron tokens.
6+: Place a Copy into an empty space within range, then gain 2 Iron tokens.

actions.name: Shatter
actions.desc: Target one of your Copies. It deals 1 damage to each enemy within its range. At the end of this turn, destroy that Copy. Usable once per turn.
